title: Anyone else log in and their entire  account was  gone
body:
so i relogged in to fine that my entire account  was level 1 from 30 complete with a name change .. no i wasnt banned and  no i have recieved no message from riot please tell me wtf is going on  my ign  is Babygurlx3 ..

edit: no as i panic relogged in my account was back..but still odd no??

replies.body: Yeah, everything looks fine to me!  You may have either logged onto an alt, or your connection may have had a hiccup so your assets weren't totally downloaded yet.  Either way, I'm glad all is well now!
It's not odd, you probably connected to an empty smurf with similar username/password without noticing it.
